authors.name: Beatriz E Nielsen
authors.affiliation: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus

86344.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f9oj2","text":"Autoclave instruments (forceps, clamps, and scalpel holders; max 5 mice per tool pack) and cotton swabs.\n\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dgcam","text":"Pull injector glass micropipettes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5n6n0","text":"Gather supplies needed for surgery (viruses, drugs, anesthetics, analgesics).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"befmr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4bf6l","text":"Disinfect surgical station.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9o017","text":"Turn on injector (Nanoject III), glass beads sterilizer, digital readout system, lamp, and heating pad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"79bbk","text":"Load injector micropipettes with injectable (virus, drugs).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ea8lh","text":"Set a clean, empty cage for recovery onto a heating pad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9ejfg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"311i6","text":"Set an area on one side of the stereotaxic frame to place sterile surgical tools, leveling tools and drill. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60jtp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1j7uh","text":"Set out cotton swabs, super glue, carprofen, bupivacaine, eye ointment, alcohol wipes and betadine.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"55k4i","text":"Start surgical log for the session.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2uj9","text":"Turn on the oxygen (1 L/min) and adjust the anesthesia machine vaporizer to 5% isoflurane.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f33ld","text":"Place paper towels in the anesthesia chamber and on top of a heating pad in the stereotaxic frame.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"55n9u","text":"Place mouse in anesthesia chamber until surgical plane of anesthesia is reached (check with toe pinch).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qag1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9b8mc","text":"Shave scalp.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"23smf","text":"Weigh mouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"471et","text":"Switch isoflurane flow from anesthesia chamber to stereotaxic frame nose cone and lower it to 1-2%.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"89l4l","text":"Mount the ear bars to held the mouse’s head symmetrically held in the stereotaxic frame. Verify that the head is stable by lightly pushing the back.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u1tg","text":"Place mouse on the stereotaxic frame: scruff mouse, gently pull tongue out and to the side with forceps, place front teeth onto the hole in the nose clip, pull cone over nose/mouth.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"uf5n","text":"Apply eye ointment bilaterally.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6kcmm","text":"Prep incision site applying betadine with a cotton swab and ethanol sterile wipes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"925i5","text":"For the remainder of the procedure, check the breathing rate and responsiveness for surgical plane of anesthesia with a toe pinch (this should be done every ~ ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":158,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"0B3CA0805BDF11ECAC573DC7EEDA3DC0","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ckt","text":"Use the scalpel to cut an incision down midline of scalp. Enlarge the surgical field using surgical clips to grab the skin on each side of the incision.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cdigm","text":"Adjust lights and pre-level skull by eye.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"2qml3","text":"Level the skull:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"67tvu","text":"Using the microscope, lower the drill bit until it touches bregma. Lift the drill bit and move it posterior and lower it to lambda. Adjust the head's position so that bregma and lambda are aligned in the midline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"779oa","text":"Position the drill in the middle between bregma and lambda and use the stereotaxic alignment indicator for leveling the head in X- and Y-directions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4b0nn","text":"Drill holes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6hv58","text":"Re-zero drill tip at bregma.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ft3ah","text":"Move to X and Y desired coordinates.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5ogcp","text":"Drill through the skull without piercing the dura or damaging the brain. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"b9t2s","text":"Remove the drill from the stereotaxic frame.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"9j5df","text":"Injection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fdamd","text":"Puncture the exposed dura using a bent 32G needle. Use cotton swabs to clear any debris and fluids.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"h9cu","text":"Load injector onto the stereotaxic frame and drive it to center of the drilled hole and zero Z-axis at the dura level or the surface of brain. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3c9cv","text":"Select the appropriate program volume and rate (usually 2nL/s) for the virus/drug to inject and start the injection. Add saline to the skull with a syringe to prevent drying.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7ljvi","text":"After the injection has been completed, leave in place another 5 minutes to allow difussion.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bjsdl","text":"Slowly withdraw the injector.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4seas","text":"Repeat for other holes if needed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dt0dg","text":"Apply a splash of bupivacaine (  bupivacaine) under the skull skin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.6","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fd6da","text":"Close incision:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7r12s","text":"Remove ear bars and pull skin back together using cotton swabs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dhtoq","text":"Inject carprofen (5mg/kg) subcutaneously (s.c.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ebk5n","text":"Apply a thin layer of glue along incision and pinch skin together using forceps.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"15don","text":"Loosen the mouse cone and remove mouse from stereotaxic frame.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"n1li","text":"Place mouse gently in the recovery cage until ambulation; then return mouse to home cage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3d2q8","text":"Complete surgical log.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"31bl0","text":"If another surgery will be done, sterilize tips of instruments using the bead sterilizer. If surgical tools have been used 5 times, open a new pack of sterile tools and replace scalpel blade.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1o5ek","text":"At end of day, turn off oxygen, anesthesia machine, injector, bead sterilizer, digital readout system, lamp, heating pads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"giij","text":"Disinfect stereotax with ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9bl88","text":"Administer a second dose of carprofen (5 mg/kg, s.c.) 24 hours after surgery.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51rbt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nknc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k0fb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Beatriz E Nielsen
creator.affiliation: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus

affiliations.affiliation: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"6c412","text":"This protocol describes the steps for generating a 6-hydroxy-dopamine (6-OHDA) mouse model of Parkinson's disease.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1idd5","text":"Low or high doses of 6-OHDA are injected into the medial forebrain bundle to induce a partial or a more complete dopaminergic lesion respectively.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6omji","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

parent_collections.title: Nielsen and Ford (2023) M4-mediated cholinergic transmission is reduced in parkinsonian mice and its restoration alleviates motor deficits and levodopa-induced dyskinesia

creator.name: Beatriz E Nielsen
creator.affiliation: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus

creator.name: Beatriz E Nielsen
creator.affiliation: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4r8od","text":"Preparation of low ( ) and high dose ( ) 6-OHDA solutions (freshly immediately before surgery):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":38,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24j1l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bne9l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":205}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"4","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":205}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1frgd","text":"For a final volume of 1 mL, weigh the appropriate amount of drug accounting for the weight of the salt component such that the following concentrations are achieved:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c9dfe","text":"6-OHDA high dose: 5 mg 6-OHDA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1bhd3","text":"6-OHDA low dose: 1 mg 6-OHDA","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7slta","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1fg7m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6phtr","text":"As 6-OHDA is light and heat sensitive, avoid exposure to light, and place on ice prior to weighing.\nWhen injecting high and low doses of 6-OHDA the same day, the low dose solution can be prepared by dilution from high dose solution. For 1 mL of low dose 6-OHDA, take 250 µL of the high dose solution and add 750 µL of vehicle. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3m6gg","text":"1 to 3 days prior to surgery, provide mice (7-8 week-old, preferrably in groups of at least 3 mice/cage) with:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4b7ur","text":"Cage enrichment with hiding places (e.g. igloos) and nesting material (avoid cage changes the day before surgery).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"735qd","text":"Supplementary food to prevent food neophobia post-surgery (e.g. food pellets soaked in water, sunflower seeds, nutritionally fortified water gel ).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":144,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41A597B6341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Dietgel","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"72-06-5022","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.clearh2o.com/research-products/dietgel/dietgel-recovery-2.html","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.clearh2o.com/research-products/dietgel/dietgel-recovery-2.html","name":"ClearH20"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"346gj","text":"Wrap in aluminum foil, vortex until drug is dissolved and place in an ice bucket.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a23ft","text":"Add 1 mL of sterile saline or sterile saline containing ascorbic acid  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":70,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ohlo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"alfl1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4mb0t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8d58e","text":"6-OHDA solutions must be used within approximately 4-5 hours after preparation. If the solution turns dark brown, this indicates that 6-OHDA has become oxidized and it must be discarded.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eftcl","text":"Gather supplies needed for surgery plus desipramine/pargyline and 6-OHDA solutions.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3be6m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fj6rs","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"95sjq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":1,"offset":65}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b7t82","text":"Unthaw the desipramine-pargyline solution aliquot and warm it at  . Vortex and check there is no precipitation of pargyline. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"16qh5","text":"6-OHDA solutions are freshly prepared.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"temperature"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c482g","text":"30 minutes prior to surgery, weigh each mouse and administer desipramine/pargyline solution at 10 mL/kg by intraperitoneal injection (i.p). (Final doses per mouse: desipramine 25 mg/kg and pargyline 5 mg/kg).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2qnge","text":"As 6-OHDA lesion is associated to significant mortality rates, post-operative care is conducted for at least 1 week post-surgery to increase survival rates:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8d5js","text":"To prevent dehydration, inject 1 mL of sterile saline (or   sterile glucose) subcutaneously (s.c.).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"edkqd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eh18p","text":"Keep house cages halfway onto the heating pad.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ded0a","text":"Keep providing supplementary (e.g. food pellets soaked in water, sunflower seeds, nutritionally fortified water gel ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":115,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41A597B6341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Dietgel","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"72-06-5022","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.clearh2o.com/research-products/dietgel/dietgel-recovery-2.html","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.clearh2o.com/research-products/dietgel/dietgel-recovery-2.html","name":"ClearH20"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97vd6","text":"Check mice daily and monitor general health, weight (every 3-4 days) and signs of pain/distress, dehydration, hypothermia, aphagia and adipsia.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"677kg","text":"Dehydration is a common complication (slow retraction of the skin following skin pinch). Inject daily 1 mL of sterile saline i.p. or s.c. (or   sterile glucose).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":142,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"F6DF6FDC3A6A11EE8E6E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dc50q","text":"In male mice, also monitor genitals, since penis prolapse (paraphimosis) and uretral plugs (obstructive uropathy) are usual complications. If there is an urethral plug, apply a lubricant (e.g. oftalmic ointment, mineral oil) and local analgesic cream if needed and try to remove it. Then use a lubricated stainless-steel probe to reinsert the penis into the prepuce if possible, or leave the penis lubricated and check for spontaneous resolution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19ljs","text":"Start stereotaxic surgery. The full detailed protocol for performing stereotaxic surgery is available below, and specific considerations for 6-OHDA lesion model of Parkinson's disease are described here:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"209g5","text":"After loading injector with 6-OHDA solutions, carefully wrap the micropipette with aluminum foil, but leaving the tip exposed to enter the brain. ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cip6m","text":"Inject 1 µL of high or low dose 6-OHDA for experimental mice and 1 µL of vehicle (saline or saline + ascorbic acid) for control mice, into the medial forebrain bundle (MFB) (coordinates: AP: -1.2 ML: +/- 1.3 DV: -4.75).","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"akqps","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9mrbi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"protocols","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":86344,"title":"Stereotaxic Surgery ","title_html":"Stereotaxic Surgery ","load_collapsed":true,"uri":"stereotaxic-surgery-cyjgxujw","image":{"source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_source":null,"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/default_protocol.png","webp_placeholder":null},"creator":{"name":"Beatriz E Nielsen","affiliation":"University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus","affiliation_url":"University of Colorado","username":"beatriz-e-nielsen","link":"","image":{"source":"/img/avatars/011.png","placeholder":"/img/avatars/011.png","webp_source":""}},"stats":{"number_of_steps":50},"type_id":1,"guid":"9263E5A037B611EE99D4012FC73B93F9"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5scrr","text":"Preparation of desipramine ( ) and pargyline ( ) solution ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dl1je","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":204}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"eabip","text":"For a final volume of 10 mL, weigh the appropriate amount of each drug, accounting for the weight of the salt component such that the following concentrations are achieved:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"90co","text":"Desipramine: 25 mg","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"43odp","text":"Pargyline: 5 mg","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cko8n","text":"Add 7-8 mL of sterile saline and sonicate with heat   until the mixture is completely dissolved.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":52,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37-45","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqm6m","text":"As the pH of this solution will be acid (~3), add   NaOH until pH=7.4.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2iueu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":22}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3jimh","text":"Bring volume up to 10 mL with sterile saline.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
